data.aiOpinion: {"Problem_Found":"The configuration command contains an undefined username and password, which results in no user authentication being set up.","Category":"Security Issue","Outage_Potentials":{"Data_Plane":false,"Control_Plane":true},"Possible_Solution":"Define a valid username and password to ensure that access control is enforced."}
